scripts.start: npm run start:infrastructure && npm run start:services
scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm run start:api-gateway" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:property"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:services
scripts.install:services: concurrently "cd microservices/api-gateway && npm install" "cd microservices/auth-service && npm install" "cd microservices/property-service && npm install"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: concurrently "cd microservices/api-gateway && npm run build" "cd microservices/auth-service && npm run build" "cd microservices/property-service && npm run build"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:services && npm run clean:shared
scripts.clean:services: concurrently "cd microservices/api-gateway && npm run clean" "cd microservices/auth-service && npm run clean" "cd microservices/property-service && npm run clean"
scripts.dev: npm run install:all && npm run start
